trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is ready to take to the road once more.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_01<tab>Search for the source of the scream.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_02<tab>Rescue the manic madame.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_03<tab>Aid the manic madame.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_04<tab>Survey the scene.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_06<tab>Have a look around Gatetown.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Assuming you have no objections, let us make our way directly to the city outskirts.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>If we time our arrival just right, you may be lucky enough to see why I have yet to set foot in Eulmore─despite my best efforts to do so...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>Come. From here, we must head west, and then cross a small bridge...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Kholusia seems peaceful, does it not? Almost...familiar? I had a similar impression of the Crystarium. Even in this distant world, people are much the same.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab><sigh> To think that whenever a calamity struck the Source, a reflection such as this one─with all its culture and history─was being erased from existence...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_012<tab>(-Screaming Woman-)N-No! Get away from me!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>...Over there!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_014<tab>Quickly, someone's in trouble!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_020<tab>P-Please, no...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_030<tab>Oh, thank the fates, y─ Look out!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_040<tab>My poor heart... Thank you, young <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>Ah, there you are! In my haste, I lost my bearings... But I see you have the situation well in hand. Fine work!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>Are you alright, madam?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_043<tab>Just a few bruises from where I fell. Nothing compared to what was in store for me before this brave soul came to my rescue.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_044<tab>I honestly thought I was done for. My feet are not as swift as they once were, and I knew there was no one left to hear me scream. Not that I let that stop me!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_045<tab><sigh> I should probably leave my old house behind and queue up outside Eulmore with the rest of them.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_046<tab>Doubt those fancy lords and ladies would welcome an old crone like me... Still, even a shack near the gate has to be safer than staying here!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>One would hope. Either way, I suggest you avoid wandering alone, lest you make the sin eaters' task any easier.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_FEARLADY03284_000_048<tab>Thank you again. You saved my life. Now, I'm sure a strapping <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> like you has little to fear, but I wouldn't linger long in this place. There's naught to be had here but cobwebs and memories.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_049<tab>'Tis as the lady says. Many in these parts have abandoned their homes to live in Eulmore's shadow.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Should the sin eaters descend upon this region, there are precious few with the strength to fight them off...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>Speaking of which, what have you been told of these monsters?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>Ah, yes. Alisaie would be well qualified to speak on the subject.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>Compared with Amh Araeng, Kholusia is almost a haven... But as you saw, we cannot let our guard down. Had you arrived but a few moments later, the sin eaters would have claimed another victim.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_054<tab>A brief history, then... 'Twas not long after the Flood swallowed the better part of the world that the sin eaters first appeared, some beastly, some beauteous.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_055<tab>Yet regardless of their form, all seem incapable of speech, and all are driven by the same insatiable appetite for mortal aether. They are predators─and we are their prey.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>Kholusia suffers from far fewer attacks than most regions, but even so, the list of the sin eaters' victims grows longer by the day. A tragedy without end...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>Still, we have won a small victory this time, at least. Now, shall we press on?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_058<tab>We need to return to where the road forks and follow the path that leads west...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>And here we are.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE_000_070<tab>Mmm, do I savor it piece by piece, or gobble it all in one go...?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_DREAMINGLADY03284_000_075<tab>Ah, Eulmore, you taunt me with your promised bounty...

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Now you understand why my attempts to enter the city have thus far come to naught. The dubious privilege of residency must be won via a contest with ever-changing rules...
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>They say this policy has been in place for the past two decades, ever since Eulmore's current ruler came into power.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>Yet from what I have seen, it does more harm than good. Not only does it distract people from our shared struggle against the sin eaters, it robs them of their self-sufficiency. I have tried to propose ways they could improve their lot, but my words invariably fall on deaf ears.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>The attitude is so <var 1A 02 /var>entrenched<var 1A 01 /var> now, I worry that─ Well, mayhap you should take a turn around Gatetown, and judge the situation for yourself.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>Go, take the measure of Gatetown. I shall wait here.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>A large pot bubbles over the flame. Pale chunks─meol, you realize─float in the otherwise plain broth.

TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE_000_110<tab>Still here, are you? Can't blame you for wanting a slice of Eulmore's pie. If you ask me, you should ditch that sour-faced brat and make a home for yourself here!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE_000_111<tab>Gatetown's not much to look at, aye, but at least it's safe. And the meol is the best thing I've ever tasted!
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_DREAMINGLADY03284_000_120<tab>Just look at it... Can you imagine a more beautiful city?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_DREAMINGLADY03284_000_121<tab>Every day, I dream of the life that waits for me inside those walls. Oh, will they <var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var> pick me...?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_130<tab>You've seen what Gatetown has to offer?
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_131<tab>These people can no longer fend for themselves. They've become dependent on handouts of meol, and believe Eulmore is the answer to all their woes.
TEXT_LUCKMA203_03284_ALPHINAUD_000_132<tab>Yet no matter how I frame my encouragement, they seem unwilling─nay, <var 1A 02 /var>unable<var 1A 01 /var>─to conceive of any other way of life...
